data.Content:
This modal shows the number of total number of genes returned by the search, and how many of these have been selected.


In the image above, 50 genes are selected out of the available 58 genes.

Use this modal to review the conditions, and to select which modes of inheritance to consider when generating the gene list. A single search term may result in multiple conditions, based on the hierarchy of conditions in GTR.
For example, the conditions Treacher Collins Syndrome 1 and Treacher Collins Syndrome 2 are considered children of Treacher Collins Syndrome and will be returned on a search for the parent condition.

Review gene panels returned for the conditions searched, along with how many genes are included on each panel. Panels can be removed from consideration, ensuring the gene list only includes genes that are covered by selected tests.

Review all test vendors, e.g. the lab that offers the gene panel tests. Any vendors can be removed from consideration, resulting in the removal of their tests, and genes unique to those tests from the final gene list.
The summary gene list combines the gene lists from the independent sources (e.g. GTR, Phenolyzer). This modal reviews how many of these genes are shared or are unique to these sources.
